about_the_game:
"You're a glutton in love."

You're Eden, an eldritch thing. You're in love with your angel Ezekiel. But Ezekiel is enamoured by the slum she is damned to and the angels stagnating in it.

She wants the slum angels to fall. You would do anything to help her. But she wants you, eldritch thing you are, to swallow up the slum as she dallies with its angels. She wants you away from her, wants to love something that is not you.

And that just can't do.

You must make Ezekiel love you. You must tell Ezekiel you love her. You may be a mass of vines and branches but you have a confession to make.

Somehow, you must find a way.

(Parchments, radios, songs… something pulsing alive. Ezekiel must hear it.)



Edenfall is a game about Eden and her angel Ezekiel. It's a darker take on the tale of Seraphim Slum: an obsessive and deranged romance between a destructive force of nature and an angel. But now, it's told from the perspective of the eldritch garden that loves her angel… a little too much.

You play as Eden as you...

  • Find out god's secrets from the slum's nooks and crannies.
  • Get to know try not to kill the fallen angels of the slum why the fuck does your angel love them.
  • Gather the pieces you need to confess your love for your angel she deserves you you're her one and only make her fall for you.

Edenfall is the next instalment to the Seraphim Slum universe. Playing the previous game is recommended, but not required to understand Edenfall.





GAME OVERVIEW

  • A dark sapphic visual novel about an angel and the eldritch in love with her.
  • Choice-based branching with 4 unique endings...
  • Esoteric and poetic musings on love and obsession...
  • Countless scene illustrations and a gore toggle for a darker take on an eldritch's love...
  • Voice-acted dialogue of Ezekiel's whisperings...
  • Custom-made OST.
  • Endings list, CG gallery, and Steam achievements!
  • A playtime of 5-6 hours for a full run.



CONTENT WARNINGS

This game isn't suitable for those who are easily disturbed. Please play at your own discretion.
  • Epilepsy warning, depictions of mental illness, unhealthy relationships, gore, body horror, distressing sound effects, deranged sapphics.




CAST & CREW

  • rosesrot - Director, Writer
  • Josh Carlat - Lead Developer
  • kayCoast - Technical & Background Artist, GUI Programmer
  • juicydev - Editor, Functional and Linguistic Quality Assurance
  • Lorraine Wong - Composer, Sound Designer, Audio Post-Production
  • Clockworkjoker - Sprite Artist
  • Anonymous - CG Artist
  • Lauren Kong - Voice of Ezekiel

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 64-bit Apple Silicon and Intel-compatible (both)
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

name: Edenfall
reviews:
“I am gnawing at the bars of my enclosure. Your games have a certain poetry to them that surpasses any experience I've had so far.”
beloved_sanguine_yandere
short_description: You're an eldritch in love with your angel. A glutton in love. You may be a mass of vines and branches but you have a confession to make. Somehow, you must find a way. (A darker sequel to Seraphim Slum.)
